verses.name: Matthew 25:27
verses.text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers, and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.

verses.name: Matthew 25:28
verses.text: Take therefore the talent from him, and give it unto him which hath ten talents.

verses.name: Matthew 25:29
verses.text: For unto every one that hath shall be given, and he shall have abundance: but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath.

verses.name: Matthew 25:30
verses.text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
